INSERT INTO estate_score ( estate_id, score_type_id, raw_score, created_at ) VALUES
( #{score.estateId}, #{score.scoreTypeId}, #{score.rawScore}, #{score.createdAt} )
ON CONFLICT (estate_id, score_type_id) DO UPDATE SET raw_score = EXCLUDED.raw_score, created_at = EXCLUDED.created_at

INSERT INTO estate_score_snapshot ( estate_snapshot_id, score_type_id, raw_score, normalized_score, created_at ) SELECT es.id AS estate_snapshot_id, s.score_type_id, s.raw_score, s.normalized_score, s.created_at FROM estate_score s JOIN estate e ON s.estate_id = e.id JOIN estate_snapshot es ON e.platform_type = es.platform_type AND e.platform_id = es.platform_id WHERE s.created_at < NOW() - INTERVAL '1 day'
